mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` ( password, name, gender, email, birth_date, phone, nickname, code_type_id, code ) SELECT #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, c.id, c.code FROM code c WHERE c.code_name = #{job} AND c.is_used = TRUE
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, gender, email, birth_date, phone, nickname, signup_at, user_status, point_balance, deleted_at, updated_at, code_type_id, code FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
